sentences.sContent: On the eighth day of Christmas.
Please follow me. Your seat is on the sixth row, the eighth seat from the aisle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Please follow me. Your seat is on the sixth row, the eighth seat from the aisle.
sentences.sCn: 请跟我来。您的座位在第六排，是从过道数过去的第八个位子。

sentences.sContent: Curb Your Enthusiasm begins its eighth season on HBO in July, and once again Larry faces his old adversary: the universe.
sentences.sContent_eng: Curb Your Enthusiasm begins its eighth season on HBO in July, and once again Larry faces his old adversary: the universe.
sentences.sCn: 《克制你的热情》在七月份由HBO开始其第八季的拍摄，而且拉里再次遭逢其老对手—宇宙。

trans.tranOther: one of eight equal parts of something
one of eight equal parts of something
